abstracts.cdata!:
This Economic Management Project
            consists of priority activities in: (i) policy analysis and
            macroeconomic management; and (ii) reform of the civil
            service as well as the large parapublic sector. Five
            specific project components have been identified and agreed
            upon with the government, they are: (i) the establishment,
            monitoring and updating of a computerized multi-year rolling
            investment program; (ii) support to the reform of the
            national statistics system; (iii) support to improve
            Cameroon's debt management; (iv) support for the
            launching of civil service reform measures, and development
            of national consulting capacities; and (v) support to the
            Technical Commission in charge of public enterprise sector
            reform and rehabilitation. The project also includes
            financing for consultant services and other assistance
            needs, and financing for the equipment and operation of a
            Project Management Secretariat.
